snippet: The International Airlines Group, parent company of British Airways and Iberia, has submitted concessions to European authorities in a bid to win regulatory approval for its takeover of BMI, the British unit of Lufthansa.
abstract: The International Airlines Group, parent company of British Airways and Iberia, has submitted concessions to European authorities in a bid to win regulatory approval for its takeover of BMI, the British unit of Lufthansa.

headline.main: British Airways Parent Offers Concessions to Buy BMI
